attributes.action: Parliament and electorate to reconsider the position taken in the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Both campaigns were fought on the basis of exaggerations and false promises. The gradual realisation of this might lead many voters to change their minds if given a second opportunity.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call for MPs of all political parties who are in favour to find a way of working together to ask both parliament and the electorate to reconsider the position taken in the EU membership referendum on 23rd June 2016
